title: Ghaf Benefits Implementation
description: IHC and Lunate have signed a MoU to explore enrolling IHC and its portfolio companies in Ghaf Benefits, a platform designed to enhance employee benefits through alternative end-of-service benefits.
example: IHC can implement Ghaf Benefits for its 1,200 subsidiaries, allowing employers and employees to benefit from flexible investment options for end-of-service gratuity. This can strengthen employee loyalty and satisfaction while providing financial growth through various investment funds.
roadmap: Step 1: Conduct an internal assessment of current employee benefits and identify areas for enhancement.
Step 2: Develop a communication plan to inform all employees about the new Ghaf Benefits options and their advantages.
Step 3: Roll out a pilot program in select subsidiaries to gauge employee interest and gather feedback.
Step 4: Analyze pilot program results and make adjustments as needed.
Step 5: Full implementation of Ghaf Benefits across all subsidiaries with continuous monitoring and support.
source_name: International Holding Company (IHC) signs MoU with Lunate to join Ghaf Benefits
